channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Men Shot Alongside Kodak Black Want $10.6 Million Default Judgment Against Rapper
item.description: Kodak Black in hot water 🔥 Men shot with a money demand 💸 Drama alert! #hiphopnews #KodakBlack

item.description: 🎶 Dive into the sonic world of Anysia Kym & Tony Seltzer with their electrifying new track "Speedrun" from the upcoming album Purity! 🔥 #NewMusicAlert

item.description: 🎷 Get ready for some smooth vibes! 🎶 @wyclefjean is taking over @BlueNoteNYC with his jazz residency! 🔥 #WyclefJean #JazzNights

item.title: Watch Jelly Roll Perform Power Ballad About His Online Haters
item.description: 🎤 Jelly Roll claps back at online haters with a powerful ballad! 🙌 Who else is feeling this fierce vibe? 🔥 #JellyRoll #MusicNews

item.description: 🌟 Cheers to John Mayer for honoring Grateful Dead's 60 years! 🎸 Let the music love continue! 💙 #MusicLegends #JohnMayer #GratefulDead

item.description: Buckle up, y'all! 🚀 Freddie Gibbs and The Alchemist hitting the road for a North American tour! 🎶 Who's ready to vibe? 🙌 #FreddieGibbs #TheAlchemist #TourAnnouncement

item.title: Green Day get their own Garbage Pail Kids cards

item.description: 🎸🌟 Rock meets animation! @BillyStrings gives the King of the Hill theme a bluegrass twist in a whimsical new reboot collaboration. #MusicNews #BillyStrings #KingOfTheHill 🎶📺
